text: Bobby DePaul (born 1963) is the former director of pro personnel for the Chicago Bears of the National Football League (NFL). ==College== DePaul played linebacker at the University of Maryland.Chicago Bears official bio ==Coaching / front-office career== DePaul started his coaching career with the Washington Redskins in 1989. He coached with the Washington Redskins and Cincinnati Bengals for eight years before entering the Philadelphia Eagles front office. He was the Director of Pro Player Personnel for the Chicago Bears from 2001-06-19 to 2010-02-15. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Maryland Terrapins football players Category:Washington Redskins coaches Category:Cincinnati Bengals coaches Category:Chicago Bears executives
title: Bobby DePaul
